articles.description: An at-home haircut led to the coronavirus deaths of a Chicago couple who took every precaution they could prior to contracting the deadly virus, according to their distraught son. Joe Bruno said hi…
articles.content:

articles.author: AFP
articles.title: 'Highly unlikely' vaccinated 91-year-old's death due to jab: Swiss authorities - Mint
articles.description: A Swissmedic spokesman called the death 'a coincidence'.The deceased had already been suffering from several diseases
articles.content: There is no indication the Pfizer-BioNTech vaccine against Covid-19 was responsible for the death of an elderly person in Switzerland just days after she received the jab, Swiss authorities said Wedn… [+2024 chars]
